title: Cruel trolls slam Katie Price for 'grubby' picture of daughter Bunny, five
text:

Katie Price was cruelly trolled when she shared a sweet picture of her five-year-old daughter Bunny today.

The former glamour model, 41, gushed over her little girl in the snap, which showed Bunny shopping in the airport and posing in a bright pink tracksuit and trainers with a Louis Vuitton bag.

"My cheeky Bunny bops," she'd captioned the photo, alongside four heart emojis.

But clearly ignoring the mantra that you shouldn't say anything at all if you can't say anything nice, it was flooded with mean comments from her followers.

One branded the picture "grubby" while others made nasty jibes at the little girl's appearance.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

They said: "Why do they always look grubby but you always leave the house looking im,aculate, spend as much effort on them as you do yourself."

"Chavy [sic]" another commented.

A third posted: "Oh you have her today do you? Makes a change, you're normally posting saying they’re with you when they're not."

(Image: Instagram)

"She looks exhausted," added another.

Mirror Online has contacted Katie's reps for comment.

Luckily, most of Katie's followers were kinder, and left comments saying how sweet Bunny looks in the photo.

One posted: "Beautiful girl, all your children are gorgeous, always be proud!!"

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

"Bless her... little sweetheart," another wrote.

It comes after it was claimed that Katie is terrified that more of her secrets will come out after her ex Charles Drury sold a story on her.

He said she'd go on regular cocaine binges and stay up for days on end, which her reps denied.
description: Katie's youngest child Bunny was seen posing in a bright pink tracksuit and trainers with a Louis Vuitton bag
